name: Wild Cards
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 41. Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres (Survival + Card Game).

Its a survival game, but you must have the right card to survive.
it's our first attempt in the making of a 3D game.

You can collect some  resources, tame animals, and upgrade your tools.
don't forget to eat, and rest, to restock your deck.

We Use:
Blender
Unity3d
Inkscape

In the "Final Version" we added and fixed a couple things that we just didn't have enough time to do before Ludum Dare's time limit:
- General Graphics upgrade.
- Added sound and music.
- Added cards count for the deck.
- Added more screen resolutions supported.
- Fixed the animations.
- Fixed some bugs.
